name: Enumerable
description: A JavaScript library that provides useful and handy query functions.
author: Anantachai Saothong <thisismanta@outlook.com>

scripts.version: grunt license:Enumerable*.* && grunt version && git commit --all --message="Released a new version"
scripts.postversion: git checkout gh-pages && git rebase master && git checkout master && git push --all && git push --tags
